name: algebra
description: means completeness and balancing, from the Arabic word الجبر

scripts.build: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run tex && npm run jekyll; git status
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify:dist; npm run browserify:test
scripts.coverage: npm run istanbul && npm run coveralls
scripts.gh-pages:_data: for x in package.json tags.json; do npm run gh-pages:_data:$x; done
scripts.gh-pages:push: git subtree --prefix gh-pages push origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages:pull: git subtree --prefix gh-pages pull origin gh-pages
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > gh-pages/index.md; cat README.md >> gh-pages/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run gh-pages:_data; cd gh-pages; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.jekyll:serve: npm run browserify; npm run homepage; npm run cp; cd gh-pages; jekyll serve; cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint_src; npm run lint_test
scripts.lint_test: cd test; standard --global describe --global it; cd -
scripts.tex: npm run tex:display; npm run tex:inline
scripts.tex:display: ls gh-pages/tex-snippets/display/*.tex | while read texfile; do cat $texfile | katex --display-mode > gh-pages/_includes/display/$(basename ${texfile%.tex}).html; done
scripts.tex:inline: ls gh-pages/tex-snippets/inline/*.tex | while read texfile; do cat $texfile | katex > gh-pages/_includes/inline/$(basename ${texfile%.tex}).html; done
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run _push
scripts.postpublish: npm run gh-pages:_data; git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated version'; npm run push
scripts.postupdate-deps: npm test && git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated deps' || git checkout -- package.json
scripts.pull: git pull origin master && npm run gh-pages:pull
scripts.push: git push origin master && npm run gh-pages:push
